CustomField.description: This is a visual indicator for new cases and displays blue if case age less than 3 hours,displays yellow if case age between 3 &5 hours and red if case age greater than 5 hours.
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( AND( TEXT(Status)='NS_New', OR( AND( Owner:Queue.QueueName='Loading & Securement Solutions (LSS)', NS_CaseAgeInHours__c>=120, NS_CaseAgeInHours__c<192 ), AND( NS_CaseAgeInHours__c>=3,NS_CaseAgeInHours__c<5, OR( NS_CaseBusinessUnit__c='OSS', NS_CaseBusinessUnit__c='Unit Train' ) ), AND( NS_CaseBusinessUnit__c='Automotive', NS_CaseAgeInHours__c>=2,NS_CaseAgeInHours__c<4 ), AND( NS_CaseBusinessUnit__c='Equipment Planning', NS_CaseAgeInHours__c>=12,NS_CaseAgeInHours__c<24 ) ) ), AND( ISBLANK(NS_AssignedTo__c), TEXT(Status)='NS_New', OR( AND( OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_Intermodal_Premium', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_Intermodal_TerminalSupport' ), (NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)>30,(NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)<=60 ), AND( (NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)>45,(NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)<=90, OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_IntermodalJBHunt', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_IntermodalTruckload' ) ), AND( (NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)>60,(NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)<=120, OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_IntermodalDomestic', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_IntermodalInternational', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_IntermodalCustomerServiceManager' ) ), AND( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_IntermodalCustomerService', (NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)>90,(NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)<=150 ), AND( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='Intermodal_Customer_Feedback', (NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)>360,(NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)<=720 ) ) ) ),IMAGE("/resource/NS_Yellow",'Yellow'), IF( OR( AND( TEXT(Status)='NS_New', OR( AND( Owner:Queue.QueueName='Loading & Securement Solutions (LSS)', NS_CaseAgeInHours__c>=192 ), AND( NS_CaseAgeInHours__c>=5, OR( NS_CaseBusinessUnit__c='OSS', NS_CaseBusinessUnit__c='Unit Train' ) ), AND( NS_CaseBusinessUnit__c='Automotive', NS_CaseAgeInHours__c>=4 ), AND( NS_CaseBusinessUnit__c='Equipment Planning', NS_CaseAgeInHours__c>=24 ) ) ), AND( ISBLANK(NS_AssignedTo__c), TEXT(Status)='NS_New', OR( AND(
OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_Intermodal_Premium', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_Intermodal_TerminalSupport' ) , (NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)>60 ), AND( (NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)>90, OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_IntermodalJBHunt', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_IntermodalTruckload' ) ), AND( (NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)>120, OR( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_IntermodalDomestic', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_IntermodalInternational', Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_IntermodalCustomerServiceManager' ) ), AND( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_IntermodalCustomerService', (NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)>150 ), AND( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='NS_CS_Feedback', (NS_CaseAgeInHours__c>=24) ), AND( Owner:Queue.DeveloperName='Intermodal_Customer_Feedback', (NS_CaseAgeInHours__c*60)>720 ) ) ) ),IMAGE("/resource/NS_Red",'Red'),null ) )
CustomField.label: Status Indicator
